name: Time Trigger (I-is-smart)
description:
THIS GAME WAS MADE FOR: BRAKEYS GAME JAM 2020.2.

I am a 12 year old boy who loves to program in Unity Game Engine, this is also my 3rd ever game jam.

In this game your only goal is to get through the big, white portal. 

In the game you are playing as a person who has the ability to rewind time on an object with the Rewinder (Gun). But there's a catch. You can't jump.

Fight enemy missiles,  solve puzzles, and defeat bosses and become the champion of the Game.

Note: This is a very hard game.
